dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.context

Class ContextManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.context.ContextManager

  • public class ContextManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages the availabe selection contexts. It is possible to register contexts, and for becoming notified about context changes it is possible to register IContextChangedListeners. 
     Context access functions:
 
     getContexts()
 getContextIds()
 getContext( String <id> )
    To get a clone of all enabled contexts, use 
     cloneContext()

    Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

    Since:
    2008.b

      • removeContextChangedListener

        2008.b

      • cloneContext

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,IContext> cloneContext()
        Clones all registered contexts. E.g. the AbstractBackendRunner uses clones of the contexts.
        Returns:
        a clone of all registered contexts without the disabled contexts
        Since:
        2008.b
